messages.message:
Hi team,
Maybe someone has asked it before, but do we have the file system access in crafting sandbox?
I was trying access it for my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/prashantkikani1?cw=dev) using this URL: `https://https--prashantkikani1-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/prashant.kikani_instabase.com/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/`

But I was getting `404 Not Found` error. I wonder if I am just trying wrong URL, or file system access if not there in crafting?

Hey! You can follow this (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yQOCxOISV_ukUxXdPJDoN-rERtOhdVRe7zv1swF1igw/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.5qai0khx0c9e) doc to log in as an admin to your sandbox and assign your user the relevant permissions through the admin app. For now, I have provided relevant perms to your user.
